an6.13:4.4: ‘mettā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā;
an6.13:4.5: atha ca pana me byāpādo cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
an6.13:4.8: mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi, na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ, na hi bhagavā evaṃ vadeyya.
an6.13:4.9: Aṭṭhānametaṃ, āvuso, anavakāso yaṃ mettāya cetovimuttiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya;
an6.13:4.10: atha ca panassa byāpādo cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassati, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an6.13:4.11: Nissaraṇañhetaṃ, āvuso, byāpādassa yadidaṃ mettācetovimuttī’ti. (1)
an6.13:5.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya:
an6.13:5.2: ‘karuṇā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā;
an6.13:5.3: atha ca pana me vihesā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
an6.13:5.6: mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi, na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ, na hi bhagavā evaṃ vadeyya.
an6.13:5.7: Aṭṭhānametaṃ, āvuso, anavakāso yaṃ karuṇāya cetovimuttiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya;
an6.13:5.8: atha ca panassa vihesā cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassati, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an6.13:5.9: Nissaraṇañhetaṃ, āvuso, vihesāya yadidaṃ karuṇācetovimuttī’ti. (2)
an6.13:6.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya:
an6.13:6.2: ‘muditā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā;
an6.13:6.3: atha ca pana me arati cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
an6.13:6.6: mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi, na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ, na hi bhagavā evaṃ vadeyya.
an6.13:6.7: Aṭṭhānametaṃ, āvuso, anavakāso yaṃ muditāya cetovimuttiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya;
an6.13:6.8: atha ca panassa arati cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassati, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an6.13:6.9: Nissaraṇañhetaṃ, āvuso, aratiyā yadidaṃ muditācetovimuttī’ti. (3)
an6.13:7.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya:
an6.13:7.2: ‘upekkhā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā;
an6.13:7.3: atha ca pana me rāgo cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
an6.13:7.6: mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi, na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ, na hi bhagavā evaṃ vadeyya.
an6.13:7.7: Aṭṭhānametaṃ, āvuso, anavakāso yaṃ upekkhāya cetovimuttiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya;
an6.13:7.8: atha ca panassa rāgo cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassati, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an6.13:7.9: Nissaraṇañhetaṃ, āvuso, rāgassa yadidaṃ upekkhācetovimuttī’ti. (4)
an6.13:8.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya:
an6.13:8.2: ‘animittā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā;
an6.13:8.3: atha ca pana me nimittānusāri viññāṇaṃ hotī’ti.
an6.13:8.6: mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi, na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ, na hi bhagavā evaṃ vadeyya.
an6.13:8.7: Aṭṭhānametaṃ, āvuso, anavakāso yaṃ animittāya cetovimuttiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya;
an6.13:8.8: atha ca panassa nimittānusāri viññāṇaṃ bhavissati, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an6.13:8.9: Nissaraṇañhetaṃ, āvuso, sabbanimittānaṃ yadidaṃ animittācetovimuttī’ti. (5)
an6.13:9.1: Idha pana bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya:
an6.13:9.2: ‘asmīti kho me vigataṃ, ayamahamasmīti ca na samanupassāmi;
an6.13:9.3: atha ca pana me vicikicchākathaṃkathāsallaṃ cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
an6.13:9.6: mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi, na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ, na hi bhagavā evaṃ vadeyya.
an6.13:9.7: Aṭṭhānametaṃ, āvuso, anavakāso yaṃ asmīti vigate ayamahamasmīti ca na samanupassato;
an6.13:9.8: atha ca panassa vicikicchākathaṃkathāsallaṃ cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassati, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
an6.13:9.9: Nissaraṇañhetaṃ, āvuso, vicikicchākathaṃkathāsallassa yadidaṃ asmīti mānasamugghāto’ti. (6)
an6.13:10.1: Imā kho, bhikkhave, cha nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo”ti.
